Author: livipup
Text: My go to is peach tea, hot brewed, with 3 pumps of sugar-free vanilla syrup. :) One time I ordered it and while the barista was making it I overheard her talking to another barista saying that it sounded very good. If you ever panic about getting a drink you can try that or something similar. I'm pretty sure it's 0 calories, so it lets you get something to avoid suspicion without having to worry over it.
